mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_DATE_CREATED BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.S_ID, E.POST_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_IMG_ID, E.SIGUNGU_ID, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_STATUS_ID, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, E.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type R ON (E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN event_status S ON (E.EVENT_STATUS_ID = S.EVENT_STATUS_ID) WHERE E.EVENT_STATUS_ID IN (3,5) AND E.SIGUNGU_ID=#{sigungu} UNION SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.S_ID, E.POST_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_IMG_ID, E.SIGUNGU_ID, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_STATUS_ID, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, E.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type R ON (E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN event_status S ON (E.EVENT_STATUS_ID = S.EVENT_STATUS_ID) WHERE E.EVENT_STATUS_ID IN (3,5) AND E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID=#{theme} ) ORDER BY EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE DESC
